title: Bug 132103: No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
OB: When scripting a data set and switching to the script view, under the 'Context' section in the palette, the expected objects 'this', 'row', and 'reportContext', as well as other objects available for other methods, should be displayed.
EB: Currently, when selecting the 'onFetch' method and opening the palette, no objects are shown under the 'Context' section. Only the 'BeforeOpen' method displays the appropriate objects. This is a regression bug related to bug 126110.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new data set and select it.
2. Switch to the script view.
3. Choose the 'onFetch' method and open the palette.

Expected result:
- Under the 'Context' section, the objects 'this', 'row', and 'reportContext', as well as other objects available for other methods, should be displayed.
